context/4: " trisr hinting" Nami yeh mashq hai jo aik tafrehi khail hai jisay aap awaami jagah par khailtay hain." di altimit trisr hint" Nami aik kitaab hai jo is ke baray mein baat karti hai. aap apni takhleeqi salahiyaton ko un logon ka tasawwur karne ke liye istemaal karte hain jin se aap milein ge, aur aap aik tafseel likhte hain, phir aap un ko misbet pegham ya hosla afzaa lafz se jor dete hain. ho sakta hai ke aap ne apne takhayyul mein shopping maal mein surkh topi mein aik no umar larke ko dekha ho, phir maal mein rehtay hue, aap ko koi aisa shakhs mil sakta hai jo is tafseel se mil khata ho. aap zahir karte hain ke aap ke paas is ke liye aik pegham hai aur aap ke paas surkh topi walay larke ke liye pegham hai. phir aap usay meharbani ka pegham den ya jo kuch aap ke dil mein tha. aap ko koi andaza nahi hai, kabhi kabhi aap kisi aisay shakhs se mlitay hain jo waqai mushkil din guzaar raha hota hai, aur kisi ajnabi ko un se mohabbat ka izhaar karne se woh rotay hain .
context/5: zabardast! yeh dilchasp hai, border line daraona hai .

response: mein waqai samajhney ke liye bohat chhota tha, lekin bzahir aisay log hain jo asiayi tarkin watan ko apne hi ristoran ke kaarobar mein sarmaya kaari karne ka jhansa dete hain. mein jaanta hon ke is ka dosra hissa yeh tha ke meri maa bemaar ho gayi thi, aur hamaray paas insurance nahi thi. sach poucheen to, mein waqai mein nahi jaanta ke waqai kya sunhwa ba muqabla mere walidain kya chahtay hain ke log sochen. mein sirf itna jaanta hon ke aik minute mein mein America mein tha, aur phir unhon ne mujhe taiwan jane walay hawai jahaaz mein bithaya, aur mein ne phir kabhi apna samaan nahi dekha. kuch tareeqon se, is ne mujhe ziyada jazbati bana diya. kya aap kahin ge ke aap apne pas manzar ke nateejay mein ziyada bunyaad parast aur amli hain ?
